k&eacute;m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng, ta c&oacute; th\u1ec3 g\u1eb7p ph\u1ea3i c&aacute;c b\u1ec7nh nh\u01b0 vi&ecirc;m da, d\u1ecb \u1ee9ng, n\u1ed5i m\u1ec1 \u0111ay hay nhi\u1ec5m tr&ugrave;ng ngo&agrave;i da.<\/strong><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>B&ecirc;n c\u1ea1nh \u0111&oacute;, khi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i kh\u0103n gi\u1ea5y \u01b0\u1edbt c&oacute; ch\u1ee9a paraben trong th\u1eddi gian d&agrave;i, s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t c&oacute; h\u1ea1i cho c\u01a1 th\u1ec3, th\u1eadm ch&iacute; g&acirc;y v&ocirc; sinh v&agrave; ung th\u01b0 v&uacute;.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110\u1ec3 l&agrave; m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng th&ocirc;ng minh, b\u1ea1n kh&ocirc;ng n&ecirc;n mua c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i kh\u0103n gi\u1ea5y, kh\u0103n gi\u1ea5y \u01b0\u1edbt hay&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.bachhoaxanh.com\/khan-giay-khan-uot-cho-be-khan-sua\" target=\"_blank\">kh\u0103n s\u1eefa<\/a>&nbsp;d&agrave;nh cho tr\u1ebb ngo&agrave;i v\u1ec9a h&egrave; m&agrave; n&ecirc;n v&agrave;o c&aacute;c c\u1eeda h&agrave;ng hay si&ecirc;u th\u1ecb l\u1edbn.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Khi l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn kh\u0103n gi\u1ea5y \u01b0\u1edbt, b\u1ea1n n&ecirc;n quan s&aacute;t quy c&aacute;ch \u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;i, ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng m\u1ef1c in tr&ecirc;n bao b&igrave; v&agrave; gi&aacute; th&agrave;nh s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110\u1eebng n&ecirc;n v&igrave; gi&aacute; th&agrave;nh th\u1ea5p h\u01a1n m&agrave; ch\u1ecdn nh\u1eefng lo\u1ea1i kh\u0103n gi\u1ea5y \u01b0\u1edbt k&eacute;m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng. V&igrave; \u0111i\u1ec1u n&agrave;y r\u1ea5t nguy hi\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"G\u1ed1i \u00f4m l\u1ec1 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng: \u00f4m th\u1eed, b\u1ec7nh th\u1eadt | Tin t\u1ee9c | TriThucCuocSong.vn\" src=\"https:\/\/photo-cms-kienthuc.zadn.vn\/zoom\/800\/Uploaded\/huyenthu\/2013_08_20\/10khan-w_PQYR.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"05 b\u1ec7nh d\u1ecb \u1ee9ng hay g\u1eb7p \u1edf tr\u1ebb nh\u1ecf\" src=\"https:\/\/cih.com.vn\/images\/08.2019\/viem-da-di-ung-o-tre-em.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>Using cheap, counterfeit, and poor-quality wet wipes&nbsp;can lead to diseases such as dermatitis, allergies, hives, or skin infections.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Besides, using wet wipes containing parabens for a long time will be very harmful to the body, even causing infertility and breast cancer.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>To be a smart consumer, don&#39;t buy wet wipes that are on-street at, a cheap price&nbsp;but should go to big stores or supermarkets.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>When choosing wet wipes, you should observe the packaging, the quality of the ink on the package, and the price of the product.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Do not choose low-quality wet wipes because of the lower price. Because this is very dangerous for health.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"G\u1ed1i \u00f4m l\u1ec1 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng: \u00f4m th\u1eed, b\u1ec7nh th\u1eadt | Tin t\u1ee9c | TriThucCuocSong.vn\" skin?","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<h3><span style=\"color:#e74c3c;\"><strong>Ch\u01b0a t\u1eebng c&oacute; 1 nghi&ecirc;n c\u1ee9u \u0111\u1ee7 quy m&ocirc; v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed9 tin c\u1eady kh\u1eb3ng \u0111\u1ecbnh r\u1eb1ng vi\u1ec7c d&ugrave;ng kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt em b&eacute; c&oacute; h\u1ea1i cho l&agrave;n da c\u1ee7a em b&eacute;.<\/strong><\/span><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>Tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p da b&eacute; b\u1ecb k&iacute;ch \u1ee9ng khi d&ugrave;ng kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt ph\u1ea7n nhi\u1ec1u do s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m k&eacute;m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng, kh&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 sinh, c&oacute; ch\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ed9c h\u1ea1i. B&eacute; s\u01a1 sinh c&oacute; l&agrave;n da m\u1ecfng manh v&agrave; c\u1ef1c k\u1ef3 nh\u1ea1y c\u1ea3m, r\u1ea5t d\u1ec5 b\u1ecb k&iacute;ch \u1ee9ng v&agrave; d\u1ecb \u1ee9ng v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n l\u1ea1 t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed9ng l&ecirc;n da b&eacute;. Trong \u0111&oacute; \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t l&agrave; th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n g&acirc;y k&iacute;ch \u1ee9ng t\u1edbi l&agrave;n da c\u1ee7a b&eacute; l&agrave;: <span style=\"color:#e74c3c;\"><u><strong>ch\u1ea5t h&oacute;a h\u1ecdc Paraben, hu\u1ef3nh quang, Phenoxyethnol, MethylisothiaZolinoe(MIT).<\/strong><\/u><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C&aacute;c m\u1eb9 c\u1ea7n ki\u1ec3m tra ngu\u1ed3n g\u1ed1c v&agrave;&nbsp;th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m k\u0129 l\u01b0\u1ee1ng tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi d&ugrave;ng cho b&eacute;. Tr&aacute;nh mua h&agrave;ng gi&aacute; r\u1ebb, tr&ocirc;i n\u1ed5i, kh&ocirc;ng nh&atilde;n m&aacute;c, thi\u1ebfu th&ocirc;ng tin s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt em b&eacute; NUNA \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t tr&ecirc;n d&acirc;y chuy\u1ec1n kh&eacute;p k&iacute;n trong ph&ograve;ng v&ocirc; tr&ugrave;ng, l&agrave;m t\u1eeb nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n l&agrave;nh t&iacute;nh an to&agrave;n cho da em b&eacute;:&nbsp;Tinh ch\u1ea5t n\u01b0\u1edbc R.O tinh khi\u1ebft, tinh ch\u1ea5t nha \u0111am l&agrave;m m&aacute;t, &ocirc;n h&ograve;a, gi\u1eef&nbsp;\u1ea9m cho da b&eacute;, v\u1ea3i Rayon m\u1ec1m m\u1ea1i, m\u1ecbn m&agrave;ng gi&uacute;p n&acirc;ng nui l&agrave;n da m\u1ecfng manh c\u1ee7a b&eacute;.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"color:#2980b9;\"><u><strong>Xem th&ecirc;m s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m NUNA<\/strong><\/u><\/span><a href=\"http:\/\/webdemo5.pavietnam.vn\/2021_yaho_nuna\/san-pham\"><u><strong><u><strong>&nbsp;<\/strong><\/u><span style=\"color:#c0392b;\">T\u1ea1i&nbsp;\u0110&acirc;y<\/span><\/strong><\/u><\/a><\/p>","noidung_en":"<h3><span style=\"color:#e74c3c;\"><strong>There has never been sufficiently large and reliable research&nbsp;to confirm that using baby wipes is harmful to a baby&#39;s skin.<\/strong><\/span><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>In case the baby&#39;s skin is irritated when using wet wipes, it is mostly due to poor quality products, unhygienic, toxic substances. Newborn babies have delicate and extremely sensitive skin, are very easily irritated, and are allergic to foreign ingredients that affect their skin. In particular, the ingredients that cause irritation to the baby&#39;s skin are chemicals<strong> <span style=\"color:#c0392b;\">Paraben, fluorescent, Phenoxyethanol, MethylisothiaZolinoe (MIT).<\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Mothers need to check the origin and ingredients of the product carefully before using it for their baby. Avoid buying cheap products, floating, without labels, lacking product information.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Currently, NUNA baby wet wipes are produced on a closed line in a sterile room, made from natural ingredients that are safe for baby&#39;s skin: &nbsp;Pure RO water essence, cooling and cooling aloe vera essence. V\u1ec1 gi&aacute;<\/strong><\/u><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Gi&aacute; 1 bao kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt t\u1eeb 80 mi\u1ebfng tr\u1edf l&ecirc;n&nbsp;ch&iacute;nh h&atilde;ng t\u1ea1i si&ecirc;u th\u1ecb t\u1eeb&nbsp; 35.000- 50.000. C&oacute; th\u1ec3 th\u1ea5p h\u01a1n n\u1ebfu c&oacute; ch\u01b0\u01a1ng tr&igrave;nh khuy\u1ec5n m&atilde;i l\u1edbn: 25.000<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Gi&aacute; 1 bao kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt t\u1eeb 80 mi\u1ebfng tr\u1edf l&ecirc;n h&agrave;ng gi&aacute; r\u1ebb, k&eacute;m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng, gi&aacute; t\u1eeb: 10.000 - 20.000<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"khan-uot-nuna\" height=\"1200\" src=\"\/2021_yaho_nuna\/datafiles\/images\/1642667582332.JPEG\" width=\"1600\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"Hi\u1ec3m h\u1ecda kh\u00f4n l\u01b0\u1eddng t\u1eeb kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt gi\u00e1 r\u1ebb b\u00e1n tr\u00e0n lan v\u1ec9a h\u00e8\" src=\"https:\/\/phongkhambinhminh.com.vn\/media\/news\/0807_images937027_12_khan_lanh.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>2. V\u1ec1 bao b&igrave;<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>H&agrave;ng ch&iacute;nh h&agrave;ng in m\u1ef1c s\u1eafc n&eacute;t, bao b&igrave; m&ocirc; t\u1ea3 chi ti\u1ebft th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n, c&ocirc;ng d\u1ee5ng, ng&agrave;y s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t, h\u1ea1n s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng, t&ecirc;n c&ocirc;ng ty, c&oacute; m&atilde; v\u1ea1ch r&otilde; r&agrave;ng, m&atilde; QR code \u0111\u01b0a t\u1edbi Websie c&ocirc;ng ty minh bach.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>H&agrave;ng gi&aacute; r\u1ebb thi\u1ebfu th&ocirc;ng tin nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t, m&ocirc; t\u1ea3 chung chung b\u1ea3ng th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n, thi\u1ebfu th&ocirc;ng tiin Website...<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>3. V\u1ec1 m&ugrave;i h\u01b0\u01a1ng<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>H&agrave;ng ch&iacute;nh h&atilde;ng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m kh&ocirc;ng m&ugrave;i, ho\u1eb7c m&ugrave;i h\u01b0\u01a1ng h\u01b0\u01a1ng: m&ugrave;i ph\u1ea5n, m&ugrave;i h\u01b0\u01a1ng hoa d\u1ec5 ch\u1ecbu th\u01a1m m&aacute;t<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>H&agrave;ng gi&aacute; r\u1ebb c&oacute; m&ugrave;i h&oacute;a h\u1ecdc, kh&oacute; ch\u1ecbu.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>4. V\u1ec1 th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7m v&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>H&agrave;ng ch&iacute;nh h&atilde;ng kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt l&agrave;m t\u1eeb n\u01b0\u1edbc tinh khi\u1ebft, s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t trong ph&ograve;ng v&ocirc; tr&ugrave;ng v\u1edbi m&aacute;y m&oacute;c t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng h&oacute;a&nbsp;\u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 sinh.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>H&agrave;ng gi&aacute; r\u1ebb s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t b\u1eb1ng n\u01b0\u1edbc m&aacute;y c&oacute; vi khu\u1ea9n kh&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 sinh, trong m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng kh&ocirc;ng \u1ea9m th\u1ea5p.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"S\u1ef1 th\u1eadt b\u1ea5t ng\u1edd v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt gi\u00e1 r\u1ebb\" src=\"https:\/\/cdn.tgdd.vn\/Files\/2017\/05\/30\/987600\/su-that-bat-ngo-ve-nhung-chiec-khan-uot-gia-re-3_800x347.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p><span style=\"color:#c0392b;\"><strong>1. About the price<\/strong><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Price for 1 pack of wet wipes from 80 pieces or more&nbsp;genuine at supermarkets from &nbsp;35,000- 50,000. Can be lower if there is a big promotion: 25,000<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>The price of 1 pack of wet wipes from 80 pieces or more is cheap, poor quality, from 10,000 - 20,000 VND<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"Hi\u1ec3m h\u1ecda kh\u00f4n l\u01b0\u1eddng t\u1eeb kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt gi\u00e1 r\u1ebb b\u00e1n tr\u00e0n lan v\u1ec9a h\u00e8\" src=\"https:\/\/phongkhambinhminh.com.vn\/media\/news\/0807_images937027_12_khan_lanh.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"color:#c0392b;\"><strong>2. About the packaging<\/strong><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Original goods are printed with sharp ink, the packaging describes in detail ingredients, uses, production date, expiry date, company name, with clear barcode, QR code sent to the company&#39;s Websie&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Cheap goods lack manufacturer information, general description of ingredients, lack of detail Website and company information.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"color:#c0392b;\"><strong>3. About the scent<\/strong><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Genuine product, no scent, or scent with the pleasant floral scent<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Cheap goods have a chemical smell, unpleasant.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"color:#c0392b;\"><strong>4. About finished products and production<\/strong><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Genuine wet wipes made from pure water, produced in a sterile room with automated machinery, ensuring hygiene.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Cheap goods produced with unsanitary bacteria in tap water, in a low-humidity environment.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"S\u1ef1 th\u1eadt b\u1ea5t ng\u1edd v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt gi\u00e1 r\u1ebb\" src=\"https:\/\/cdn.tgdd.vn\/Files\/2017\/05\/30\/987600\/su-that-bat-ngo-ve-nhung-chiec-khan-uot-gia-re-3_800x347.jpg\" \/><\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"phan-biet-khan-uot-hang-chinh-hang-va-khan-uot-gia-re-tiem-an-nhieu-rui-ro","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"8","icon":null,"icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"dowload_text":"","duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1646982377","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"1","step":"5","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"Kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt gi\u00e1 \u0111\u1eaft v\u00e0 gi\u00e1 r\u1ebb kh\u00e1c nhau nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf n\u00e0o?","seo_title_en":"Distinguishing the good wet wipes and cheap wet wipes with many potential risks to health?","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"Kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt gi\u00e1 \u0111\u1eaft v\u00e0 gi\u00e1 r\u1ebb kh\u00e1c nhau nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf n\u00e0o?","seo_keywords_en":"Distinguishing the good wet wipes and cheap wet wipes with many potential risks to health?","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"Kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt gi\u00e1 \u0111\u1eaft v\u00e0 gi\u00e1 r\u1ebb kh\u00e1c nhau nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf n\u00e0o?","seo_description_en":"1. About the price  Price for 1 pack of wet wipes from 80 pieces or more\u00a0genuine at supermarkets from \u00a035,000- 50,000. Can be lower if there is a big promotion: 25,000  The price of 1 pack of wet wipes from 80 pieces or more is cheap, poor quality, from 1","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","opt3":"0","opt4":"0","opt5":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":"","thongso_vi":"","thongso_en":"","thongtin_vi":"","thongtin_en":"","ngayden":"0","ngaydi":"0","id_tag_multi":"","gioitinh":"0"},{"id":"115","id_user":"1","id_parent":"6","tenbaiviet_vi":"Tra ngay  4 TH\u00c0NH PH\u1ea6N tr\u00ean g\u00f3i kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt sau, n\u1ebfu c\u00f3 m\u1eb9 n\u00ean \u0111\u1ed5i ngay v\u00ec s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe c\u1ee7a con tr\u1ebb.","tenbaiviet_en":"Immediately look up 4 INGREDIENTS on the following wet wipes package, to choose a good wet wipe for your baby.","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<h3><span style=\"color:#c0392b;\"><strong>4 th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n g&acirc;y h\u1ea1i th\u01b0\u1eddng c&oacute; trong kh\u0103n gi\u1ea5y \u01b0\u1edbt bao g\u1ed3m:&nbsp;<u>Paraben, hu\u1ef3nh quang, Phenoxyethnol, MethylisothiaZolinoe(MIT).<\/u><\/strong><\/span><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>Nhi\u1ec1u nghi&ecirc;n c\u1ee9u \u0111&atilde; ch\u1ec9 ra&nbsp;<strong>Paraben <\/strong>(th\u01b0\u1eddng nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t s\u1ebd ph\u1ed1i h\u1ee3p nhi\u1ec1u g\u1ed1c parabens nh\u01b0&nbsp;methylparaben, ethylparaben, propylparaben, v&agrave; butylparaben) v&agrave; <strong>Methylisothiazolinone<\/strong> c&oacute; th\u1ec3 khi\u1ebfn ng\u01b0\u1eddi d&ugrave;ng b\u1ecb&nbsp;vi&ecirc;m da v&agrave; \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng t\u1edbi h\u1ec7 n\u1ed9i ti\u1ebft. Ng&agrave;y 28\/7\/2015, C\u1ee5c Qu\u1ea3n l&yacute; d\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111&atilde; ban h&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng v\u0103n s\u1ed1 13884\/QLD-MP v&agrave; quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh s\u1ed1 421\/Q\u0110-QLD, quy \u0111\u1ecbnh c\u1ea5m s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng 5 d\u1eabn xu\u1ea5t Paraben v&agrave; Methylisothiazolinone (MIT). Theo \u0111&oacute;, khi \u0111i mua kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt cho tr\u1ebb, ph\u1ee5 huynh n&ecirc;n \u0111\u1ecdc k\u1ef9 th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n v&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng n&ecirc;n ch\u1ecdn c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ch\u1ee9a nh\u1eefng ch\u1ea5t n&agrave;y.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Phenoxyethanol l&agrave; ch\u1ea5t c&oacute; kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng gi\u1ebft vi khu\u1ea9n, n\u1ea5m, men, gi&uacute;p cho s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m kh&ocirc;ng b\u1ecb nhi\u1ec5m khu\u1ea9n, gi&uacute;p k&eacute;o d&agrave;i tu\u1ed5i th\u1ecd c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m. \u0110\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t l&agrave; v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ed1i t\u01b0\u1ee3ng tr\u1ebb em, th&igrave; n\u1ed3ng \u0111\u1ed9 c\u1ee7a ch\u1ea5t b\u1ea3o qu\u1ea3n Phenoxyethanol trong c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ch\u0103m s&oacute;c da ph\u1ea3i d\u01b0\u1edbi 1%.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Hu\u1ef3nh quang l&agrave; th\u01b0\u1eddng c&oacute; trong v\u1ea3i kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt, nh\u1eb1m m\u1ee5c \u0111&iacute;ch t\u1ea9y tr\u1eafng. N\u1ebfu ch&uacute;ng ta th\u01b0\u1eddng xuy&ecirc;n ti\u1ebfp x&uacute;c v\u1edbi lo\u1ea1i ch\u1ea5t n&agrave;y trong m\u1ed9t th\u1eddi gian d&agrave;i th&igrave; s\u1ebd d\u1eabn \u0111\u1ebfn vi\u1ec7c m\u1eafc c\u0103n b\u1ec7nh m&aacute;u tr\u1eafng ho\u1eb7c c\u0103n b\u1ec7nh ung th\u01b0.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Nh\u01b0ng v&igrave; da em b&eacute; r\u1ea5t m\u1ecfng manh v&agrave; nh\u1ea1y c\u1ea3m, c&aacute;c m\u1eb9 n&ecirc;n tr&aacute;nh h\u1ebft s\u1ee9c c&oacute; th\u1ec3 khi mua c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c&oacute; g\u1ed1c t\u1eeb:&nbsp;<span style=\"color:#c0392b;\"><u><strong>Paraben, hu\u1ef3nh quang, Phenoxyethnol, MethylisothiaZolinoe(MIT). <\/strong><\/u><\/span><u>Ho\u1eb7c c&oacute; th\u1ec3 tra c\u1ea9n th\u1eadn n\u1ed3ng \u0111\u1ed9 c&aacute;c ch\u1ea5t h&oacute;a h\u1ecdc tr&ecirc;n tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh mua s\u1eafm.<\/u><\/p>","noidung_en":"<h3><span style=\"color:#c0392b;\"><\/span><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<h3><span style=\"color:#c0392b;\">4 harmful ingredients commonly found in wet wipes include Paraben, Fluorescent, Phenoxyethanol, MethylisothiaZolinoe (MIT).<\/span><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p><br \/>\r\nMany studies have shown that Parabens (usual manufacturers will combine many parabens such as methylparaben, ethylparaben, propylparaben, and butylparaben) and Methylisothiazolinone can cause users to have skin inflammation and affect the endocrine system. On July 28, 2015, the Drug Administration of Vietnam issued Official Letter No. 13884\/QLD-MP and Decision No. 421\/QD-QLD, prohibiting the use of 5 Paraben and Methylisothiazolinone derivatives (MIT). Accordingly, when buying wet wipes for children, parents should carefully read the ingredients and should not choose products containing these substances.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Phenoxyethanol is a substance that has the ability to kill bacteria, fungi, and yeast, keeping the product from being contaminated, helping to prolong its life of the product. Especially for children, the concentration of the preservative Phenoxyethanol in skincare products must be less than 1%.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Fluorescence is commonly found in wet wipes for the purpose of bleaching. If we are regularly exposed to this substance for a long time, it will lead to leukemia or cancer.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>But because a baby&#39;s skin is very delicate and sensitive, mothers should avoid as much as possible when buying products based on: &nbsp;<span style=\"color:#c0392b;\"><strong>Paraben, Fluorescent, Phenoxyethanol, MethylisothiaZolinoe(MIT).<\/strong><\/span> Or you can carefully check carefully of these chemicals before deciding to buy.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3><span style=\"color:#c0392b;\"><\/span><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"color:#c0392b;\"><\/span><\/strong><\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"cach-nhin-thanh-phan-tren-goi-khan-uot-de-chon-dung","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"7","icon":null,"icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"dowload_text":"","duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1646981948","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"1","step":"5","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"C\u00e1ch nh\u00ecn TH\u00c0NH PH\u1ea6N tr\u00ean g\u00f3i kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt \u0111\u1ec3 ch\u1ecdn \u0111\u00fang","seo_title_en":"Immediately look up 4 INGREDIENTS on the following wet wipes package, to choose a good wet wipe for your baby.","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"C\u00e1ch nh\u00ecn TH\u00c0NH PH\u1ea6N tr\u00ean g\u00f3i kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt \u0111\u1ec3 ch\u1ecdn \u0111\u00fang","seo_keywords_en":"Immediately look up 4 INGREDIENTS on the following wet wipes package, to choose a good wet wipe for your baby.","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"C\u00e1ch nh\u00ecn TH\u00c0NH PH\u1ea6N tr\u00ean g\u00f3i kh\u0103n \u01b0\u1edbt \u0111\u1ec3 ch\u1ecdn \u0111\u00fang","seo_description_en":"4 harmful ingredients commonly found in wet wipes include Paraben, Fluorescent, Phenoxyethanol, MethylisothiaZolinoe (MIT).  Many studies have shown that Parabens (usual manufacturers will combine many parabens such as methylparaben, ethylparaben, propylp","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","opt3":"0","opt4":"0","opt5":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":"","thongso_vi":"","thongso_en":"","thongtin_vi":"","thongtin_en":"","ngayden":"0","ngaydi":"0","id_tag_multi":"","gioitinh":"0"}]
